name: TokyoToastMorningNewsfromJapaneseTwitter
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
It's been a dream of mine since middle school to have a radio show. Somehow I ended up in television, but it's never too late to make dreams come true. I've launched my own Alexa Flash Briefing called 'Tokyo Toast' with daily Japanese news based on trending Twitter hashtags from Tokyo.

Tune in everyday for a 3 minute bite of Tokyo Toast by adding me to your Alexa Flash Briefing. Or read the article version on the same topics here on LinkedIn. Or follow me on Twitter @MarikoLochridge as I go through the topic tweet by tweet every day (and some retweets too).
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
